name: Life Lessons
description: A fetus in a simulation is taught a series of lessons about life by a primitive, overly literal artificial intelligence. There's 30 different "lessons" to get through, but you probably won't survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8 Processor: CPU 1.2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800 x 600 VRAM 256MByte DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
